statements: SELECT * FROM SalesPredictions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT prediction_date, predicted_sales_amount FROM SalesPredictions WHERE predicted_sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_behavior_category FROM SalesPredictions WHERE prediction_date = '2022-05-10';
SELECT * FROM SalesPredictions ORDER BY customer_behavior_category DESC;
SELECT AVG(predicted_sales_amount) AS avg_sales FROM SalesPredictions;
SELECT id, customer_id, prediction_date, predicted_sales_amount, customer_behavior_category FROM SalesPredictions WHERE customer_id = 1234 ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT id, customer_id, predicted_sales_amount FROM SalesPredictions WHERE customer_behavior_category = 'High Value' ORDER BY predicted_sales_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(predicted_sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesPredictions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT customer_behavior_category, COUNT(*) AS num_predictions FROM SalesPredictions WHERE prediction_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY customer_behavior_category;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(predicted_sales_amount) AS avg_sales FROM SalesPredictions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_sales > 5000;
SELECT * FROM sales_predictions ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, predicted_sales FROM sales_predictions WHERE predicted_sales > 1000;
SELECT date, product_id, predicted_sales FROM sales_predictions WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT product_id, predicted_sales FROM sales_predictions ORDER BY predicted_sales DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_score FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_score BETWEEN 80 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_score > 80 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_score, purchase_history FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_score < 50 AND customer_id = 100;
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM sales_predictions WHERE date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY predicted_sales DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(behavior_score) AS total_behavior_score FROM customer_behavior GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_behavior_score > 200;
SELECT * FROM sales_predictions JOIN customer_behavior ON sales_predictions.product_id = customer_behavior.customer_id WHERE predicted_sales > 1000;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_id, SUM(units_sold) AS total_units_sold FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1001
SELECT email, customer_name FROM customer_data WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT product_id, date, forecasted_units FROM sales_forecast ORDER BY forecasted_units DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE units_sold > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT product_id, SUM(units_sold) AS total_units FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_units > 500 ORDER BY total_units DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT date, SUM(forecasted_units) AS total_forecasted_units FROM sales_forecast GROUP BY date HAVING total_forecasted_units > 1000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_predictions LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM sales_predictions WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT date, quantity, revenue FROM sales_predictions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type FROM customer_behavior;
SELECT * FROM sales_predictions WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, date, behavior_type FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue FROM sales_history GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales_history GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_sales > 5;
SELECT * FROM sales_forecast WHERE units_sold > 100
SELECT product_name, sale_date FROM sales_forecast ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, purchase_history FROM customer_behavior WHERE loyalty_points >= 500
SELECT product_name, category FROM product_catalog WHERE price < 50.00
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segments
SELECT * FROM sales_forecast;
SELECT product_name, units_sold, sale_date FROM sales_forecast WHERE units_sold > 100 ORDER BY units_sold DESC;
SELECT product_name, units_sold, sale_date FROM sales_forecast WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sale_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY sale_date;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customer_behavior WHERE loyalty_points > 500 ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segments;
